title: John Elkann - Wikipedia
snippet: Elkann is the chief executive officer of Exor, the chairman of Stellantis, general partner of Giovanni Agnelli B.V., and the executive chairman of Ferrari. Additionally, he is the chairman of the Giovanni Agnelli Foundation. He is also a trustee of MOMA, a member of Pinacoteca Giovanni e Marella ...

title: Chairman John Elkann’s speech* Stellantis AGM 2025 Amsterdam, April 15, 2025
snippet: Chairman John Elkann’s speech* Stellantis AGM 2025 · Amsterdam, April 15, 2025 · Ladies and Gentlemen, Good morning, good afternoon and good evening to all of you here · in Amsterdam and everyone who is connected remotely. Let me start by saying that 2024 was not a good year for Stellantis.

title: Stellantis on X: "As we begin 2025, #Stellantis Chairman John Elkann reflects on our remarkable journey since Stellantis' creation. With our strong foundation, we'll build our future together, drawing strength from our history, roots and distinct identities that make the company special. https://t.co/CUv45TCEFM" / X

title: Europe's carmakers should steer clear of defence industry, Stellantis' Elkann says | Reuters
snippet: [1/3]John Elkann, chairman of carmaker Stellantis, looks on before answering questions from an Italian parliamentary committee, in Rome, Italy, March 19, 2025.
